title: THE DRAGONS ARE AWESOME!
body:
RIOT, I LOVE U! 

This has genuinely changed the game up and i feel for the better. Now solo queues are a whole lot less toxic, could just be preseason idk, but legit. Now every game i'm playing in, everybody works as a team, and prioritizes objectives. The dragon buffs are awesome to have and everybody racing for the dragon soul, its heaps of fun. Especially those dragon pit fiestas, simply awesome.

These new changes have just, it makes the game feel fresh and awesome again. the alcoves are, meh, alright i suppose, but the dragons, OH MAN!{{summoner:31}}{{item:2010}} 



Thank you


P.s. I have yet to vs assassins lol. I can imagine that being a real nuisance.
